text: Belostemma yunnanense is a species of plant in the family Apocynaceae first described in 1941. It is endemic to Yunnan Province in China.Flora of China Vol. 16 Page 252 镰药藤 lian yao teng Belostemma yunnanense Tsiang, Sunyatsenia. 6: 139. 1941. The species is listed as vulnerable.China Plant Specialist Group 2004. Belostemma yunnanense. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 20 August 2007. ==References== Category:Flora of Yunnan Category:Asclepiadoideae Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Plants described in 1941 Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
